channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9th Circuit: Local Authorities In Washington State Can’t Block Feds From Deporting Illegals

item.title: Who else might Biden pardon after he spared Hunter from sentencing?
item.description: President Biden pardoned son Hunter Biden this week, sparking renewed interest about who else the 46th president may pardon before his exit from the W...

item.title: Court: Fani Willis Must Turn Over Communications With ‘Get Trump’ Special Counsel, J6 Committee
item.description: Fulton County DA Fani Willis must turn over communications with Special Counsel Jack Smith and Democrats' Jan. 6 Committee, a judge ruled.

item.title: Just Enjoy Wicked
item.description: I’m happy to report that Wicked provided all that I wanted: a few hours of entertainment.

item.title: CNN panelists liken South Korea under martial law to U.S. under Trump
item.description: Two members of a CNN panel discussion Tuesday looked at the images of South Korea under martial law and saw America under Donald Trump.

item.title: Democratic challenger Adam Gray flips California's 13th Congressional District in nation's final House race
item.description: Democrat Adam Gray has won California's 13th Congressional District race, defeating incumbent Republican Rep. John Duarte.

item.description: Numerous artists have complained about President-elect Donald Trump's use of their songs at his rallies. The sailor in the Village People is no longer...

item.title: Trump Is Well within His Rights to Fire Christopher Wray
item.description: A response to David Frum.

item.title: ‘Celebrating Diversity’: Biden’s Army, Navy Nominees Pushed DEI Ideology While In Uniform
item.description: Military specialists have warned that the armed forces' overzealous focus on 'diversity' is hampering its ability carry out and execute missions.

item.title: Montana legislature refuses to ban transgender lawmaker from women's restroom at state capitol

item.description: It's no coincidence that Musk, one of the most high-profile business figures with a dissenting political voice, has found himself on the receiving end...

item.title: Lori Chavez-DeRemer Wants to Ban the Red-State Model
item.description: A Republican administration needs a secretary of labor who will stand for workers, not organized labor.

item.title: Report: Trump considering Ron DeSantis for defense secretary as Pete Hegseth nomination sputters
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is considering replacing Pete Hegseth as his nominee to lead the Pentagon with Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis.

item.title: GOP senator to propose ban on gender transition treatment for minors
item.description: Republican Sen. Roger Marshall is introducing a bill, shared exclusively with Fox News Digital, to prevent gender-related medical treatment on minors.

item.title: Media Meltdowns Over Trump’s FBI Pick Prove Kash Patel Is The Perfect Man For The Job
item.description: The only reason media oppose Patel as Trump’s FBI pick is because he is a threat to their role as deep state colluders.

item.title: Trump Gets It Right, but Can He Stick with It?
item.description: It seems Republican voters did not lose their taste for a confident, extroverted American presence on the world stage.
